title: FS: T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait SGC 3
author: aloondilana

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait SGC 3
posts.post_content:
A true oddity here with severe diamond cut and wet sheet transfer which reverse images Cobb's profile. There's just not another one like it. That's why I bought it!

Color and registration are off the charts. Crease free. Oh yeah, these are on fire. Asking $7750 net overnighted. I'll take it in the thread beats on-going negotiations, but honestly there's not much room here. These are trending similar to Goudey Ruths if anyone happens to be paying attention. Just saying
